name: GoPro Handlebar / Seatpost / Pole Mount
description: Attach your GoPro to tube shaped things: handlebars, seat poles, ski poles, canoe paddles, roof racks, and such. The design clamps to different mounting locations and secures to poles or pipes to make a handheld boom. The base rotates 360° to capture shots from any angle, and the mounting buckle lets you quickly switch between mounts.Hinged, non-slip design clamps to any tube 9–35mm in diameter.Base rotates 360° with 16 secure positions, allowing rapid changes in perspective.Mounting buckle lets you move your camera between mounts on the fly.Durable construction minimizes vibration and camera shake.Integrated design ensures there are no loose parts to drop or lose.Compatible with all GoPro HERO cameras.
